Effect: Accept Echo.name: Effect: Accept Echo
Effect: Accept Echo.description:
While in this state, you become trained in the weapon you chose and an expert in the skill you chose. Additionally, while you're in this state, the echo can speak and interact with the Material Plane using your body, and you gain a +4 status bonus to all saves against possession effects, as the possessing spirit protects you from other possessions.

This state lasts for 10 minutes, after which the echo disappears completely until the next time you make your daily preparations. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo] this effect.

At 7th level you become a master of the skill you chose, at 13th level you become an expert with the weapon you chose, and at 15th level you become legendary with the skill you chose.

If you begin a new interrogation, this effect ends for any previous target. After your interrogation ends, the target is immune to this ability for 24 hours.

Effect: Bone Swarm.name: Effect: Bone Swarm
Effect: Bone Swarm.description:
You become Huge, gain the swarm trait, and gain a fly Speed of 40 feet. As a swarm, you have the following characteristics.

  • You are immune to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM] conditions.
  • You have weakness 5 to area and splash damage.
  • You can occupy the same space as other creatures and must do so to use your damaging ability.
  • As a 2-action activity, you can deal [[/r 10d6[bludgeoning]]] damage to all creatures sharing your space (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save with a DC equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher).
  • You can't speak, Cast Spells, use manipulate actions requiring your hands, Activate magic items, or make any Strikes with your normal body.
  • You don't gain the swarm mind ability, so you are still affected normally by mental effects. You also retain the benefits of skeleton feats that don't require communication or the use of hands.

Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide pointers and lead drills that ensure your newer colleagues' attacks strike true. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to attack rolls and spell attack rolls to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's attack roll and spell attack roll modifiers by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Consume Energy (Augment Strike).name: Effect: Consume Energy (Augment Strike)
Effect: Consume Energy (Augment Strike).description: Strikes with the chosen weapon or unarmed attack deal an additional 1d6 damage of a type matching the energy you consumed.

Effect: Control Tower.name: Effect: Control Tower
Effect: Control Tower.description: Your keen senses and ability to process battlefield information have dramatically improved, allowing you to drastically reduce the advantage of unseen foes. You and allies in your overwatch field gain a +2 circumstance bonus when using the Seek action to find hidden or undetected creatures within the overwatch field. You and your allies don't have to succeed at a flat check to target a concealed creature within your overwatch field. When you or an ally targets a hidden creature in your overwatch field, reduce the DC of the flat check to 5.

Moderate Curse

Effect: Curse of Ancestral Meddling.name: Effect: Curse of Ancestral Meddling
Effect: Curse of Ancestral Meddling.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.qvRlih3u7vK3FYUR]

Curse of Ancestral Meddling

The ancestral spirits you commune with haunt you and meddle with your belongings and actions, either out of a well-intentioned (but ultimately detrimental) attempt to assist you, as punishment for your audacity in circumventing the traditional means of achieving divine power, for their own amusement, or a mixture of the above. Your hair, clothing, and belongings constantly shift and stir, seemingly of their own volition.

Minor Curse

One of your ancestors becomes predominant in their meddling. The first time you gain this effect each day, roll [[/r 1d4]] on the list below to determine which type of ancestor becomes predominant. This predominant ancestor guides you to use their preferred type of action. When you try to use one of the types of actions listed for the other ancestors, you must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:4]. On a failure, you spend the action but gain no effect (though you don't lose the spell if you were Casting a Spell). If your action would take 1 minute or longer, it's long enough that you can overcome the meddling, and you don't need to attempt a flat check.

During combat or another tense, round-by-round encounter, other ancestors wrestle for control of your actions. When you roll initiative, and then at the end of each of your turns during the encounter, roll [[/r 1d4]] and change your predominant ancestor appropriately. Once the encounter ends, you return to the influence of the ancestor you first rolled for the day.

Moderate Curse

The flat check DC to use other actions is 6, and you get the moderate curse benefit listed for your predominant ancestor in the list below.

Major Curse (11th)

The flat check DC is 8, and you get the major curse benefit listed for your predominant ancestor instead of the moderate curse benefit.

Ancestral Influence

  1. Martial Ancestor
    • Preferred action Strikes
    • Moderate curse benefit Your Strikes gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage.
    • Major curse benefit Your Strikes gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +6 status bonus to damage
  2. Skillful Ancestor
    • Preferred action Perception and Skill actions
    • Moderate curse benefit You gain a +1 status bonus to skill checks and Perception checks.
    • Major curse benefit You gain a +2 status bonus to skill checks and Perception checks.
  3. Spellcasting Ancestor
    • Preferred action Cast a Spell
    • Moderate curse benefit Non-cantrip spells without a duration gain a status bonus to their damage and healing equal to the spell's level.
    • Major curse benefit Non-cantrip spells without a duration gain a status bonus to their damage and healing equal to the spell's level + 3.
  4. You choose which ancestor guides your actions

Effect: Curse of Creeping Ashes.name: Effect: Curse of Creeping Ashes
Effect: Curse of Creeping Ashes.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.tzDW9l4lBwXCVYtz]

Curse of Creeping Ashes

Your body is slowly being consumed by the fires of your internal power, purifying you with each passing day. You are occasionally wracked with dry, wheezing coughs, and wherever you go you leave behind a fine trace of ash that falls from your body.

Minor Curse

The smoldering furnace of power within you begins to feed on your body and generate ash, which you inhale with every breath and leave behind with every step, impeding your footing. You take a â€“1 penalty on Constitution-based checks, such as Fortitude saves, and your Speed is reduced by 10 feet.

Moderate Curse

The ash you produce intensifies and fills the area around you, obscuring details and making the ground challenging to navigate. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]. An aura of ash surrounds you in a 10-foot emanation. You and creatures in the aura are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]. If you do not move for 1 round, heaps of ashes settle in the aura, creating difficult terrain that lasts until you move (when the ashes blow away).

Major Curse (11th)

You and nearby creatures collapse into ash with the slightest flame. Within your moderate curse's aura, you and all creatures gain weakness to fire equal to half your level. If a creature other than you in this aura is killed by fire damage, its body collapses into ash. Objects and structures in your aura halve their Hardness, and any parts of the object or structures in your aura that are reduced to 0 Hit Points collapse into ash.

Effect: Curse of Engulfing Flames.name: Effect: Curse of Engulfing Flames
Effect: Curse of Engulfing Flames.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.GTSvbFb36InvuH0w]

Curse of Engulfing Flames

You see flames and smoke wherever you look. These flames might be imagined, or they might be a preternatural glimpse of the metaphorical fires that empower the entire multiverse-but you always see them. Fires flare noticeably (though not dangerously) in your presence, you occasionally smoke slightly, and your body is almost painfully hot to the touch.

Minor Curse

The smoke, heat, and crackling flames of your curse fill your vision and all your other senses.

Creatures further than 30 feet are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W] from you. You can't benefit from effects that would allow you to ignore or mitigate this concealment, as normal for effects of an oracular curse.

Moderate Curse

Smoke and flickering visions of flame fill your senses more completely, and harmless flickers of obscuring flames also fill your space.

You are concealed from other creatures, though as the other creatures aren't cursed themselves, they can benefit from effects that would allow them to ignore or mitigate the concealed condition, as normal. All other creatures and objects are concealed from you regardless of distance; however, when casting a fire spell, you automatically succeed at the flat check for this concealed condition for targets within 30 feet.

All your senses become imprecise beyond 30 feet, meaning everything past 30 feet that you'd normally be able to see is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC] from you.

Major Curse (11th)

The flames surrounding you are no longer simply visions.

An aura of fire surrounds you in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10], dealing [[/r 4d6[fire]]] damage (basic Reflex save) to all other creatures in the aura at the end of each of your turns. You lose [[/r 1d6]] Hit Points at the end of your turn each round, with no save; if you have a weakness to fire, increase the number of HP you lose by that weakness.

You can suppress your aura until the start of your next turn by spending a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to diminish the flames, causing neither you nor anyone in the aura to take damage. While Refocusing to reduce your curse, you are continually diminishing the flames, so you don't lose HP. The flames subside if you fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf], but they resume when you wake up unless you rested for long enough to reset your curse. As usual for oracular curses, you can't mitigate or reduce the lost Hit Points in any way, though you can still heal the lost HP normally after the fact.

Effect: Curse of Living Death.name: Effect: Curse of Living Death
Effect: Curse of Living Death.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.IaxmCkdsPlA52spu]

Curse of Living Death

Your body is slowly decaying even though you are alive, and using your powers furthers this unnatural living death. You carry a touch of the grave about you, manifesting as bloodless pallor, a faint smell of earth, or deathly cold skin.

Minor Curse

Bones protrude through your skin and your flesh rots, combining with a stench of decay and an unearthly chill. Non-magical effects that would restore your Hit Points only grant you half as many HP as normal.

Moderate Curse

Your dead flesh continues to rot, affecting your health. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, and this drained condition is cumulative with any other drained conditions you gain. This drained condition is removed only when you Refocus; effects that normally remove the drained condition reduce your drained condition to drained 1 instead.

In addition, you gain resistance to poison equal to half your level. You gain a +4 status bonus to saves against diseases, poisons, and death effects, and if you roll a success on such a save, you get a critical success instead.

Major Curse (11th)

You stand just steps from the grave. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 1}. This wounded condition is removed only when you Refocus; effects that normally remove the wounded condition reduce your wounded condition to wounded 1 instead.

When you would attempt a recovery check, you can choose to get an automatic success instead of rolling, and if you roll a critical failure on a save against a disease, poison, or death effect, you get a failure instead.

Effect: Curse of Outpouring Life.name: Effect: Curse of Outpouring Life
Effect: Curse of Outpouring Life.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.o1gGG36wpn9mxeop]

Curse of Outpouring Life

Life energy flows outward from you and connects you to all living things, but you expend your vital essence to do so. Your presence comforts the ill and injured, causes scars to fade slightly, spurs new growth in plants, and otherwise infuses your surroundings with vitality.

Minor Curse

As your life force seeps outward, it becomes more difficult to keep your body functioning. Effects that restore Hit Points to you take a status penalty equal to half your level (minimum 1) to the number of HP you recover.

Moderate Curse

The flow of life energy away from you can't be reversed.

In addition to the effects of your minor curse, you can't be healed by magical effects originating from other creatures. However, if you are unconscious, magical effects can restore you to 1 HP (but no higher). You are affected normally by healing elixirs, potions, and other items.

When you cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs] and all your targets are living creatures, you roll d12s instead of d8s for the amount of healing.

Whenever you finish casting a non-cantrip spell, you restore Hit Points equal to the spell level to your choice of either one target of the spell or the creature nearest to you. You can't heal yourself in this way. This healing has the healing, necromancy, and positive traits, as well as the tradition trait of the spell.

Major Curse (11th)

Life energy tears through you to empower your magic. Some of your spells carry positive energy with them.

Each time you use a spell slot to cast a 5th-level or higher spell that takes 2 or more actions to cast, you disperse positive energy in a @Template[type:burst|distance:30] with the effects of a 3-action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs] spell with a level 4 lower than that of the spell you cast. This healing occurs immediately after you finish Casting the Spell. You don't benefit from this healing. Instead, you lose double the number of Hit Points rolled for the heal spell.

Effect: Curse of the Hero's Burden.name: Effect: Curse of the Hero's Burden
Effect: Curse of the Hero's Burden.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.gjOGOR30Czpnx3tM]

Curse of the Hero's Burden

You thrive while adrenaline flows and your life depends on your might alone, but holding the collective battle prowess of the ages within you leaves your body weakened after a fight. You smell faintly of steel and blood no matter how you try to remove or mask the scent, you appear more muscular than you actually are, and you hear the faint clash and clamor of battle in the distance at all times.

Minor Curse

Your body languishes when you aren't bringing harm to your foes. You take a -2 status penalty to AC and saving throws, but each time you make a Strike, you can suspend these penalties until the start of your next turn.

Moderate Curse

The strain of conflict wears upon your body, even though you gain vitality from it. Making a Strike reduces the penalty from your minor curse to -1 rather than suspending it entirely. You gain a +2 status bonus to weapon and unarmed damage rolls. You also gain fast healing equal to half your level while in a non-trivial combat encounter.

Major Curse (11th)

Your body proves capable of truly heroic feats, but doing so interferes with your mental focus. Your moderate curse's fast healing is equal to your level, and its damage bonus is +6. You gain a +1 status bonus to weapon and unarmed attack rolls, but you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2}.

Effect: Curse of the Perpetual Storm.name: Effect: Curse of the Perpetual Storm
Effect: Curse of the Perpetual Storm.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.W9cF7wZztLDb1WGY]

Curse of the Perpetual Storm

You are the center of your own tiny tempest, ever surrounded by wind and rain that worsens the more you tap into your elemental powers. Even when you are calm and at rest, your hair and clothing are blown about by gentle winds, you are slightly damp, and your touch often comes with a static shock.

Minor Curse

An aura of a whirling storm whips up in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] around you and in your space. The aura puts out small non-magical fires 1 round after they're lit or brought into your aura.

Electrical energy builds up within your storm, turning you into a lightning rod; you gain weakness 2 to electricity, and electricity spells or effects that have additional effects for a creature wearing or holding metal treat you as though you were wearing metal.

Moderate Curse

Your minor curse's aura expands to a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] and carries rain on the winds. The whirling winds impose a -2 circumstance penalty on ranged attack rolls using physical ammunition that target you or originate from you.

Your weakness to electricity increases to 5 or half your level, whichever is greater, but torrential rain grants you an equal amount of fire resistance.

Major Curse (11th)

Your minor curse's aura expands to a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15] and grows stronger. High winds blowing outward in the aura impede creatures' progress. The aura is difficult terrain for Large and smaller creatures on the ground, and for Huge or smaller flying creatures. You aren't affected by this difficult terrain.

The electricity arcing through you becomes dangerous. Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed melee attack or non-reach melee weapon takes [[/r 1d6[electricity]]] damage. As normal, this doesn't affect creatures you touch.

Effect: Curse of the Sky's Call.name: Effect: Curse of the Sky's Call
Effect: Curse of the Sky's Call.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.RI2EMRBBPNSoTJXu]

Curse of the Sky's Call

You have your head in the clouds-and not just figuratively. Your body is drawn toward the heavens, making you lighter and less substantial than you should be. Your eyes glow with starry light, and your hair and clothing float and drift around you.

Minor Curse

Your unnatural lightness makes it hard to keep your footing and interact with other physical objects. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} and take a -2 penalty to saves and DCs against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731], and other forms of forced movement.

Moderate Curse

Your body is drawn further skyward. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}, and the penalty from your minor curse increases to -3.

You are treated as one size smaller for wind effects. You gain a +2 status bonus against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP] attempts, you only take half as much damage from falls, and you gain the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.HJYQlmGTdtyGWr6a] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.ZBhvJ9O8MvBFAlhq] skill feats. You weigh only half as much, and your Bulk, should someone need to carry you, is also half as much.

Major Curse (11th)

As your body rises, you float just above the ground beneath you. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 4}, and the penalty from your minor curse increases to -4.

You can walk on liquids as if they were solid; you gain the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.TVFfTP9fHRidwBlW] skill feat; and you don't leave tracks, trigger weight-sensitive pressure plates, or otherwise connect with the ground below you.

Effect: Curse of Torrential Knowledge.name: Effect: Curse of Torrential Knowledge
Effect: Curse of Torrential Knowledge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.tZBb3Kh4nJcNoUFI]

Curse of Torrential Knowledge

You have a link to true divine knowledge, but your mortal mind struggles to process and act on what you know. Loose materials around you, such as dust, grains of rice, and droplets of water, slowly shift to form strange runes or faint indecipherable writing, and you sometimes speak unintelligible truths or statements in unknown languages without realizing it.

Minor Curse

You take a -4 penalty to initiative, as trying to process a surge of information about what's happening around you slows your ability to respond to it.

Moderate Curse

The flow of information through your mind grows. The attention you divert to process this huge influx of information means you are always @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg].

At the start of each of your turns, you automatically make one check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo] as a free action. This uses a skill of your choice that has the Recall Knowledge action, using a result equal to 10 + your proficiency bonus in that skill (with no other bonuses, penalties, or modifiers).

Major Curse (11th)

The massive flow of information clouding your mind overwhelms your ability to communicate with others. You can understand all languages, but you can't speak, use linguistic effects, or otherwise communicate with your allies.

If you Cast a Spell with a verbal component, you must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] or the spell is lost.

You gain a +4 status bonus on saving throws against linguistic effects.

Effect: Curse of Turbulent Moments.name: Effect: Curse of Turbulent Moments
Effect: Curse of Turbulent Moments.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.EslxR2sbDK9XJaAl]

Curse of Turbulent Moments

Time passes differently for you than everyone else. You experience fluxes that might manifest as minor day-to-day changes in your apparent age, such as a gray lock of hair or a disappearing wrinkle, or as occasional ghostly temporal afterimages that slightly trail your movement.

Minor Curse

As you draw upon your mystery, time's passage becomes more disjointed, aging, regressing, or warping you out of sync. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}. In addition, you take a -2 penalty to saving throws against effects that would make you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3].

Moderate Curse

Time distorts further, increasing your muscular atrophy, age regression, or warping while making effects pass you by at an increased rate. The value of your enfeebled condition increases to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} and the penalty from your minor curse increases to -3. Your status bonus to AC against attacks made against you from reactions or free actions while you're moving increases to +2. In addition, spells affecting you last less time; their duration is reduced by half, to a minimum of 1 round. This doesn't reduce the spell's duration for other targets affected by the same spell. Finally, all non-permanent conditions affecting you that have a duration measured in rounds, minutes, or hours have their duration reduced by half, to a minimum of 1 round. Any afflictions (such as poisons, diseases, and curses) affecting you have their maximum duration, onset time, and time for each stage reduced by half. Spells, conditions, and afflictions that last "until your next daily preparations" last for 12 hours or until your next daily preparations, whichever comes first. This doesn't change the duration you're temporarily immune, the rate at which you can use abilities that have a frequency, or any other features based on the passage of time.

Major Curse (11th)

You become so out of sync with time that it's hard for you to act, but when you do act, you do so with incredible speed. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}, the value of your enfeebled condition increases to 3, and the penalty from your minor curse increases to -4. Time passes so much faster for you that your steps appear as a blur of motion to others. You gain a +4 status bonus to initiative rolls. Whenever you move, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W] while you're moving and until the start of your next turn. As normal for concealment where your location is still obvious, you can't use this concealment to Hide or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]. Your status bonus to AC against attacks made against you from reactions or free actions while you're moving increases to +4.

Effect: Cut from the Air.name: Effect: Cut from the Air
Effect: Cut from the Air.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.6xBu4BewIkOIt9M0].

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Effect: Daydream Trance.name: Effect: Daydream Trance
Effect: Daydream Trance.description: You take a -1 penalty to Perception checks and initiative rolls and gain a +1 status bonus to Will saves. This bonus increases to +2 against mental effects. If you're legendary in Occultism, the bonus against mental effects increases to +3 .

Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon.name: Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon
Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.AYXherMu9gFTyXjp].

Effect: Debilitating Strike.name: Effect: Debilitating Strike
Effect: Debilitating Strike.description:
The target has been affected by a rogue's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB].

Note: this effect only tracks the duration of the debilitation. You need to manually apply the specific penalties the rogue chose to apply.

Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success).name: Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success)
Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.4HHw2DjTxdv1jBZd]

For 1 round, the target takes a -10 foot status penalty to Speed and a -4 status penalty to Stealth.

Effect: Decry Thief (Success).name: Effect: Decry Thief (Success)
Effect: Decry Thief (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.4HHw2DjTxdv1jBZd]

For 1 round, the target takes a -5 foot status penalty to Speed and a -2 status penalty to Stealth.

Effect: Deep Freeze (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Deep Freeze (Critical Failure)
Effect: Deep Freeze (Critical Failure).description: The target takes a -15-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Deep Freeze (Failure).name: Effect: Deep Freeze (Failure)
Effect: Deep Freeze (Failure).description: The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Deep Freeze (Success).name: Effect: Deep Freeze (Success)
Effect: Deep Freeze (Success).description: The target takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Defensive Instincts.name: Effect: Defensive Instincts
Effect: Defensive Instincts.description:
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.RxA1PdgGbijkieJD]

Requirements you are adjacent to at least two enemies

Your body tenses up when surrounded, putting you on edge just enough to anticipate an attack. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn and Step.

Effect: Defensive Recovery.name: Effect: Defensive Recovery
Effect: Defensive Recovery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.d1ktdX1Fk37dG5ms]

If the next action you use is to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs] on a single target and the target regains Hit Points from the spell, it also gains a +2 status bonus to AC and saving throws for 1 round.

Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Self).description: The corruption of sin makes you more imposing. You gain a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round.

Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Target).name: Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Target)
Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Target).description: The corruption of sin weakens a target's defenses. A target takes a -1 status penalty to AC for 1 round.

Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs
Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]

For 1 hour, treat environmental heat effects as if they were one step less severe.

Effect: Deteriorated.name: Effect: Deteriorated
Effect: Deteriorated.description:
Associated with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.ZR5Buon23cDQ1ryB].

While your body is deteriorated, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}. You can spend 10 minutes checking and repairing your joints and other weak parts of your body to recover from deterioration. You can perform these repairs as part of your daily preparations. Because it's a natural result of your body's functions, you can't remove the slowed condition from deterioration through any other means.

Effect: Devrin's Cunning Stance.name: Effect: Devrin's Cunning Stance
Effect: Devrin's Cunning Stance.description: You have a +1 status bonus to skill checks. When you Strike a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg] enemy, that enemy can't use reactions until the beginning of its next turn.

Effect: Diabolic Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Diabolic Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Diabolic Blood Magic (Self).description: Hellfire fills your tongue with lies. You gain a +1 status bonus to Deception checks for 1 round.

Effect: Didactic Strike.name: Effect: Didactic Strike
Effect: Didactic Strike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.6fojN9yBJByTZ1Q9].

Your first attack against the designated target before the investigator's next turn deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to the target if it hits.

Effect: Discordant Voice.name: Effect: Discordant Voice
Effect: Discordant Voice.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.8JMOgtB3XG7o6ffW], while you are affected by Inspire Courage.

Effect: Distracting Feint.name: Effect: Distracting Feint
Effect: Distracting Feint.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.hLYoIjH8gPEVXyWG]

While a creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg] by your Feint, it also takes a -2 circumstance penalty to Perception checks and Reflex saves.

Effect: Divine Aegis.name: Effect: Divine Aegis
Effect: Divine Aegis.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.xoIxiRtBVHV27Rvd]

Until the beginning of your next turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against non-divine magical effects, but you also take a -1 circumstance penalty to saves against divine effects.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi].

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 chaotic damage.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi].

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 evil damage.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Force).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Force)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Force).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi].

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d4 force damage.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Good).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Good)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Good).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi].

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 good damage.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi].

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 lawful damage.

Effect: Draconic Blood Magic.name: Effect: Draconic Blood Magic
Effect: Draconic Blood Magic.description: Draconic scales grow briefly on you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to AC for 1 round.

Effect: Dragon's Rage Wings.name: Effect: Dragon's Rage Wings
Effect: Dragon's Rage Wings.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.bqZkAFS6eq9TKXMO]

While you are raging, you gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed.

Effect: Dread Marshal Stance.name: Effect: Dread Marshal Stance
Effect: Dread Marshal Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.R7c4PyTNkZb0yvoT]

You gain a status bonus to damage rolls equal to the number of weapon damage dice of the unarmed attack or weapon the originator of the aura is wielding that has the most weapon damage dice. When you or an ally in the aura critically hits an enemy with a Strike, that enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Effect: Elemental Assault.name: Effect: Elemental Assault
Effect: Elemental Assault.description: You shroud your arms and held weapons in elemental magic. Choose one element. Until the end of your next turn, your Strikes deal an additional [[/r 1d6]] damage of the indicated type and have the trait corresponding to the element: electricity for air, bludgeoning for earth, fire for fire, or cold for water.

Effect: Elemental Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Elemental Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Elemental Blood Magic (Self).description: Elemental energy surrounds you. You gain a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round.

Effect: Elementalist Dedication.name: Effect: Elementalist Dedication
Effect: Elementalist Dedication.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.tx9pkrpmtqe4FnvS]

Each day when you make your daily preparations, you can attune yourself to one element of your choice: air, earth, fire, or water. You gain resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1 resistance) against damage dealt by effects with your attuned elemental trait. This attunement lasts until you next make your daily preparations.

Effect: Emblazon Antimagic (Weapon).name: Effect: Emblazon Antimagic (Weapon)
Effect: Emblazon Antimagic (Weapon).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.xAFdoKl7aOP9rVkl].

When the weapon's wielder critically hits with the weapon, they can attempt to counteract a spell on their target, using half their level, rounded up, as the counteract level. If they attempt to do so, the emblazoned symbol immediately disappears.

Effect: Emblazon Armament (Weapon).name: Effect: Emblazon Armament (Weapon)
Effect: Emblazon Armament (Weapon).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.7RFjTTzznsdPcaYB] when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The wielder gains a +1 status bonus to damage rolls.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid).name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW] when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 acid damage, or an extra 1d6 acid damage if you have a domain spell with the acid trait.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold).name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW] when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 cold damage, or an extra 1d6 cold damage if you have a domain spell with the cold trait.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electri.name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electricity)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electri.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW] when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 electricity damage, or an extra 1d6 electricity damage if you have a domain spell with the electricity trait.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire).name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW] when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 fire damage, or an extra 1d6 fire damage if you have a domain spell with the fire trait.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic).name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW] when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 sonic damage, or an extra 1d6 sonic damage if you have a domain spell with the sonic trait.

Effect: Emotional Surge.name: Effect: Emotional Surge
Effect: Emotional Surge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.d8DI7wLxtUy99g9K]

You gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks.

Effect: Encroaching Presence.name: Effect: Encroaching Presence
Effect: Encroaching Presence.description:
Seeing and touching the beyond leaves you open to its alien influence, warping your perceptions and thoughts.

Mild Backlash Something inexplicable touches your mind, leaving you with lingering horror. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3}.

Moderate Backlash Disorienting visions and figments cover your vision, as if you're seeing through another set of alien senses. For 10 minutes, all creatures become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W] to you as they are covered in visual distortions only you can see.

Severe Backlash Your life force is siphoned away as the presence tugs your soul to wherever it resides. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} until your next daily preparations.

Effect: Enduring Debilitating Strike.name: Effect: Enduring Debilitating Strike
Effect: Enduring Debilitating Strike.description:
The target has been affected by a rogue's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB] if the rogue also has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.RzfWrOqHL2GcK0rr].

Note: this effect only tracks the duration of the debilitation. You need to manually apply the specific penalties the rogue chose to apply.

Effect: Energetic Meltdown.name: Effect: Energetic Meltdown
Effect: Energetic Meltdown.description:
As you channel energy through your deviant abilities, some of it turns back on you, spiking your body temperature or dancing across your skin.

Mild Backlash You take [[/r @actor.level]]{damage equal to your level} as energy scours your body.

Moderate Backlash Energy wracks your body. After taking the damage, you gain weakness to the energy type of your backlash until your next daily preparations. The weakness is equal to one-third of your level. You also lose immunity to the energy type if you had it, until your next daily preparations.

Severe Backlash Whatever furnace or well within you that provides the energy for your deviation overloads completely, cascading out of you in an uncontrolled burst. You deal [[/r (@actor.level)d6]]{1d6 damage per level} to all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save. You automatically take full damage without attempting a save.

Effect: Energize Wings.name: Effect: Energize Wings
Effect: Energize Wings.description: You gain a fly Speed of 30 feet.

Effect: Energy Shot.name: Effect: Energy Shot
Effect: Energy Shot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.TSDbyYRQwhIyY2Oq]

On your first three Strikes of this encounter with a firearm or crossbow, you deal an additional 1 acid, cold, fire or electricity damage. You choose which damage type to deal as part of making each Strike.

Effect: Enforce Oath.name: Effect: Enforce Oath
Effect: Enforce Oath.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.YZ138OqflDhrkqmR]

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saves against attacks and effects by the chosen creature. You also gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls against the chosen creature.

However, your dedication to Enforcing your Oath draws your focus away from all other foes. While you are Enforcing your Oath, you take a -1 status penalty to AC, attack rolls, and saves against all other creatures until you stop Enforcing your Oath.

You stop Enforcing your Oath once the chosen creature is reduced to 0 Hit Points or offers a legitimate surrender to you or your allies. You immediately stop Enforcing your Oath if you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf] or if the chosen creature goes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9evPzg9E6muFcoSk] by you for more than 1 minute. You can also stop Enforcing your Oath at any time during your turn as a free action.

Effect: Engine of Destruction.name: Effect: Engine of Destruction
Effect: Engine of Destruction.description: Your construct innovation gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack rolls.

Effect: Enlightened Presence.name: Effect: Enlightened Presence
Effect: Enlightened Presence.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.ROnjdPMvH0vkkWjQ].

You and allies within 15 feet of you gain a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws against mental effects.

Effect: Eye of the Arclords.name: Effect: Eye of the Arclords
Effect: Eye of the Arclords.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.OtV7esAwza1U6Kwr].

While the eye is open, you gain the following benefits:

  • you gain the effects of the detect magic arcane innate spell from your Arcane Sense at the start of each of your turns without needing to cast the spell;
  • you gain darkvision;
  • you gain a +2 status bonus to Perception checks to Seek undetected and hidden creatures and to your Perception DC against Hide and Sneak.

Effect: Favorable Winds.name: Effect: Favorable Winds
Effect: Favorable Winds.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.OK8Fm7EG8wjoYZBX].

You wrap a shell of favorable wind around a weapon you wield. On your next Strike with a ranged weapon before the start of your next turn, you don't take circumstance penalties on the attack roll due to wind. In addition, if that weapon has a range increment of 10 feet or less, increase its range increment by 10 feet for that Strike.

Effect: Fey Blood Magic.name: Effect: Fey Blood Magic
Effect: Fey Blood Magic.description: Colorful fey glamours dance around you or one target, causing them to be concealed for 1 round. Such obvious concealment can't be used to Hide.

Effect: Fiendish Wings.name: Effect: Fiendish Wings
Effect: Fiendish Wings.description: You can strain to call forth bat-like or otherwise fiendish wings from your back, similar in appearance to those of your fiendish ancestors. Once manifested, these wings remain for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while you've manifested your wings.

Effect: Fleet Tempo.name: Effect: Fleet Tempo
Effect: Fleet Tempo.description: You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +10-foot status bonus to all Speeds for 1 minute.

Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs
Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]

Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against disease and poison effects.

Effect: Formation Training.name: Effect: Formation Training
Effect: Formation Training.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.aoz9dCq2NynyUYEf]

You know how to fight in formation with your brethren. When you are adjacent to at least two hobgoblin allies, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 on Reflex saves against area effects.

Effect: Fortify Shield.name: Effect: Fortify Shield
Effect: Fortify Shield.description: Add your level to your shield's Hardness.

Effect: Fulminating Shot.name: Effect: Fulminating Shot
Effect: Fulminating Shot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.o3J79hnr00ztcwtT]

Choose acid, cold, electricity, or fire. If you hit with your next attack roll using a firearm or crossbow before the end of your turn, you deal 1d6 additional damage of this type. At 12th level, this increases to 2d6 additional damage, and at 18th level, it increases to 3d6 additional damage.

Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Self).description: Your spellcasting warps reality and distracts your foes. You gain a +1 status bonus to Deception checks for 1 round.

Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Target).name: Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Target)
Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Target).description: Your spellcasting warps reality and distracts your foes. A target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception for 1 round.

Effect: Ghost Wrangler.name: Effect: Ghost Wrangler
Effect: Ghost Wrangler.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.00OnDt8UEMwfoYWH]

Your fists gain the effects of the ghost touch property rune.

Effect: Giant's Lunge.name: Effect: Giant's Lunge
Effect: Giant's Lunge.description: Until your rage ends, all your melee weapons and unarmed attacks gain reach 10.

Effect: Giant's Stature.name: Effect: Giant's Stature
Effect: Giant's Stature.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.W21jKAcG0GtEtBiK]

You become Large, increasing your reach by 5 feet and gaining the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} condition until you stop raging

Effect: Great Tengu Form.name: Effect: Great Tengu Form
Effect: Great Tengu Form.description:
Once per day, as part of using Long-Nosed Form, you also gain the benefits of 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8].

This lasts for 5 minutes or until you shift out of your Long-Nosed Form, whichever happens first.

Effect: Guardian's Deflection.name: Effect: Guardian's Deflection
Effect: Guardian's Deflection.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.JdCRxwgtdQkJ1Ha6] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.YJIzE2RhGRGfbt9j].

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Effect: Guardian's Embrace.name: Effect: Guardian's Embrace
Effect: Guardian's Embrace.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to AC against physical attacks and can use a reaction to gain resistance 10 to physical damage dealt by that attack, which ends this effect.

Effect: Guided by the Stars.name: Effect: Guided by the Stars
Effect: Guided by the Stars.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.s1swBWSqtfrXTJHK]

You roll twice and take the better result on your next skill check or saving throw. If it's night and you can see the stars, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the triggering roll.

Effect: Guided Skill.name: Effect: Guided Skill
Effect: Guided Skill.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to checks made using Acrobatics, Occultism, Stealth, or Survival.

Effect: Hag Blood Magic.name: Effect: Hag Blood Magic
Effect: Hag Blood Magic.description: Spiteful curses punish your foes. The first creature that deals damage to you before the end of your next turn takes 2 mental damage per spell level and must attempt a basic Will save.

Effect: Hamstringing Strike.name: Effect: Hamstringing Strike
Effect: Hamstringing Strike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.s2GbcUIXG1ZBurSd]

If you hit your prey, the creature takes a -5-foot status penalty to Speed. If you critically hit your prey, the creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to Speed.

Effect: Harden Flesh.name: Effect: Harden Flesh
Effect: Harden Flesh.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.REgTwIVgI3j1FQiJ]

You gain resistance 3 to physical damage, except adamantine, until the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Harrow the Fiend.name: Effect: Harrow the Fiend
Effect: Harrow the Fiend.description: You gain a +1 status bonus on all Strikes or spell attack rolls against fiends.

Effect: Harsh Judgement.name: Effect: Harsh Judgement
Effect: Harsh Judgement.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.37uOb0iaWCfTCvBZ]

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize them. You have a -1 circumstance penalty to Perception checks to Seek creatures other than your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize anyone other than your condemned foe.

Effect: Heaven's Thunder.name: Effect: Heaven's Thunder
Effect: Heaven's Thunder.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.qJdbK8vgIqeHU7bu]

Until the end of your next turn, your unarmed attacks and any monk weapons you wield deal additional electricity and sonic damage; the amount of each damage type is equal to the number of damage dice for the weapon or unarmed attack. Any creature who successfully Grapples you or is successfully Grappled by you takes this damage immediately after the Grapple check is resolved (using the number of damage dice of your unarmed attack to determine the damage dealt).

If you also know the ki blast ki spell, you can choose to deal either electricity or sonic damage with the spell instead of force while this effect is active (ki blast loses the force trait and gains the electricity or sonic trait instead).

Effect: Heroes' Call.name: Effect: Heroes' Call
Effect: Heroes' Call.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level.

Effect: Heroic Recovery.name: Effect: Heroic Recovery
Effect: Heroic Recovery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.KR78kinMmAZQHeoa]

If the next action you use is to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs] targeting a single living creature and the target regains Hit Points from the spell, it also gains three bonuses until the end of its next turn: a +5-foot status bonus to its Speed, a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, and a +1 status bonus to damage rolls.

Effect: High-Speed Regeneration Speed Bo.name: Effect: High-Speed Regeneration Speed Boost
Effect: High-Speed Regeneration Speed Bo.description: You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Effect: Holy Castigation.name: Effect: Holy Castigation
Effect: Holy Castigation.description:
Imposed by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.142QRyK2aPIrJu48]

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs] spells you cast damage fiends as though they were undead.

Effect: Hungry Goblin.name: Effect: Hungry Goblin
Effect: Hungry Goblin.description: You'll eat anything and anyone. Whenever you inflict @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} with your jaws unarmed attack, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level for 1 minute.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.6v4Rj7wWfOH1882r] edge with you.

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against your hunted prey is -3 (-2 with an agile weapon) on your second attack of the turn instead of -5, and -6 (-4 with an agile weapon) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of -10.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.NBHyoTrI8q62uDsU] edge with you.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception checks, Intimidation checks, Stealth checks, and any checks to Recall Knowledge about the prey, and a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against your prey's attacks.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.u6cBjqz2fiRBadBt] edge with you.

You have trained to aim for your prey's weak points. The first time you hit your hunted prey in a round, you also deal 1d8 additional precision damage. (Precision damage increases the damage you already deal, using the same type, but is ineffective against creatures that lack vital organs or weak points.)

At 11th level, the extra damage increases to 2d8 precision damage, and at 19th level, the extra damage increases to 3d8 precision damage.

Effect: Hybrid Shape (Beastkin).name: Effect: Hybrid Shape (Beastkin)
Effect: Hybrid Shape (Beastkin).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.0b3TTeQGFOiy6ykz]{Change Shape}.

In hybrid shape, you appear as a mix between your ancestry and your inherent animal. While in hybrid shape, you gain a jaws unarmed Strike resembling the features of your inherent animal (fangs for bats, beaks for eagles, mandibles for wasps, and so on). Your jaws deal 1d4 piercing damage, have the agile, finesse, and unarmed traits, and are in the brawling weapon group.

Effect: Hydration.name: Effect: Hydration
Effect: Hydration.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.vt67b8uoNEbskcBv] if you spend 24 hours outside of water.

Effect: Imperial Blood Magic.name: Effect: Imperial Blood Magic
Effect: Imperial Blood Magic.description: A surge of ancestral memories grants you or one target a +1 status bonus to skill checks for 1 round.

Effect: Improved Poison Weapon.name: Effect: Improved Poison Weapon
Effect: Improved Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.9Eufa07qvXG41QmG].

Effect: Inspired Stratagem.name: Effect: Inspired Stratagem
Effect: Inspired Stratagem.description: You roll the triggering check twice and take the better of the two results.

Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance.name: Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance
Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.bvOsJNeI0ewvQsFa]

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saves against mental effects.

Effect: Inspiring Resilience.name: Effect: Inspiring Resilience
Effect: Inspiring Resilience.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to their Will save against the triggering effect, or a +2 circumstance bonus if the effect originated from an undead.

Effect: Invigorating Breath.name: Effect: Invigorating Breath
Effect: Invigorating Breath.description: You gain 20 temporary Hit Points. At 15th level, you instead gain 30 temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Juvenile Flight.name: Effect: Juvenile Flight
Effect: Juvenile Flight.description:
You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while your wings are unfurled.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.UuVz1QY7QXD5cnLu], you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your fly Speed with Juvenile Flight. As normal, since your fly Speed is derived from your land Speed, this status bonus isn't cumulative with a status bonus to your land Speed, if you have one.

Effect: Known Weakness.name: Effect: Known Weakness
Effect: Known Weakness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.iWvpq3uDZcXvBJj8].

Your ally gains a +1 circumstance bonus to their next attack roll against the subject of known weakness, as long as their attack is made before the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter.name: Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter
Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2] if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv].

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

Effect: Legendary Monster Warden.name: Effect: Legendary Monster Warden
Effect: Legendary Monster Warden.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV] if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv].

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.VU7aZC7L08Mk1GVA]

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil aberration, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.K3QkcNWY8qpNEJrk]

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil dragon, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.uv235v6hXCITAFej]

If you use Liberating Step triggered by a fiend, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.lDfOzhKJoTCkLPtn]

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an undead, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Life-Giving Magic.name: Effect: Life-Giving Magic
Effect: Life-Giving Magic.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Living for the Applause.name: Effect: Living for the Applause
Effect: Living for the Applause.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures).name: Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures)
Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]

You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 10 creatures.

Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures.name: Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures)
Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]

You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 100 creatures.

Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide key spellcasting insights that augment your colleagues' magic. Any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours can prepare one additional spell of their highest-level spell slot or cast one additional spell of their highest-level spell slot. When casting spells of a magical tradition that is the same as the tradition you use for spellcasting, the affected PC also increases the Level Bump's modifier to spell DCs to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's spell DCs by 1, and it does not grant any additional spells prepared or spell slots.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

**Spell-DC not implemented yet. The rule is in place for when it is but all DCs must be increased manually for now**

Effect: Maiden's Mending.name: Effect: Maiden's Mending
Effect: Maiden's Mending.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Marshal's Aura.name: Effect: Marshal's Aura
Effect: Marshal's Aura.description:
Granted by being inside a Marshal's Aura.

Your aura has the emotion, mental, and visual traits and grants you and allies within the aura a +1 status bonus to saving throws against fear.

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.JhLncIB10GSQowWL] with you.

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against your hunted prey is -3 (-2 with an agile weapon) on your second attack of the turn instead of -5, and -6 (-4 with an agile weapon) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of -10.

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.vWZaLE2fEKMBw3D5] with you.

Your mastery of skills allows you to overwhelm your prey. If you have master proficiency in Deception, Intimidation, Stealth, or the skill you use to Recall Knowledge about your prey, increase the circumstance bonus against the prey with that skill from +2 to +4.

If you have master proficiency with your armor, increase the circumstance bonus to AC against the prey from +1 to +2.

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precisi.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precision
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precisi.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.BJYSUbFUGcTLaPDn] with you.

The second time in a round you hit your hunted prey, you also deal 1d8 precision damage.

At 19th level, your second hit in a round against your hunted prey deals 2d8 precision damage, and your third hit in a round against your hunted prey deals 1d8 precision damage.

Effect: Methodical Debilitations.name: Effect: Methodical Debilitations
Effect: Methodical Debilitations.description: The target is unable to flank or provide flanking.

Effect: Monster Hunter.name: Effect: Monster Hunter
Effect: Monster Hunter.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

Effect: Monster Warden.name: Effect: Monster Warden
Effect: Monster Warden.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.

Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs
Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves.

Effect: Mountain Stronghold.name: Effect: Mountain Stronghold
Effect: Mountain Stronghold.description: You focus on your connection to the earth and call upon the mountain to block attacks against you. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Mutate Weapon.name: Effect: Mutate Weapon
Effect: Mutate Weapon.description: Select one unarmed attack you gained with Living Weapon. The damage die for that attack increases by one step until the end of your turn. In addition, choose to either have the attack gain a reach of 10 feet until the end of your turn or for you to gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with the chosen unarmed attack until the end of your turn.

Effect: Necrotic Infusion.name: Effect: Necrotic Infusion
Effect: Necrotic Infusion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.6erzXaxxvcXYnL9H].

If the next action you use is to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz] to restore Hit Points to a single undead creature, the target then deals an additional 1d6 negative damage with its melee weapons and unarmed attacks until the end of its next turn. If the harm spell is at least 5th level, this damage increases to 2d6, and if the harm spell is at least 8th level, the damage increases to 3d6.

Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Self).description: Nymph grace accentuates your movements and distracts your foes, granting you a +1 status bonus to Diplomacy checks for 1 round.

Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Target).name: Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Target)
Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Target).description: Nymph grace accentuates your movements and distracts your foes, imposing a -1 status bonus to Will saves for 1 round.

Effect: Overdrive.name: Effect: Overdrive
Effect: Overdrive.description: Your gizmos go into a state of incredible efficiency called critical overdrive, adding great power to your attacks. Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier for 1 minute. After the Overdrive ends, your gizmos become unusable as they cool down or reset, and you can't use Overdrive for 1 minute.

Effect: Overdrive (Success).name: Effect: Overdrive (Success)
Effect: Overdrive (Success).description: Your gizmos go into overdrive, adding power to your attacks. Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to half your Intelligence modifier for 1 minute. After the Overdrive ends, your gizmos become unusable as they cool down or reset, and you can't use Overdrive for 1 minute.

Effect: Overwatch Field.name: Effect: Overwatch Field
Effect: Overwatch Field.description: Your overwatch field aura grants you increased perception and allows you to call out warnings to your allies within the aura to point out threats. This aura has the auditory and visual traits. You and allies within your overwatch field receive a +2 circumstance bonus when using Perception for Initiative checks.

Effect: Panache.name: Effect: Panache
Effect: Panache.description:
You care as much about the way you accomplish something as whether you actually accomplish it in the first place. When you perform an action with particular bravado, you can leverage this moment of verve to perform spectacular, deadly maneuvers. This state of flair is called panache, and you are either in a state of panache or you are not.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]

Effect: Perfect Resistance.name: Effect: Perfect Resistance
Effect: Perfect Resistance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.QN55ToyJIjxgPmhs]

After using a Student of Perfection ki spell, the resistance increases to be equal to your level for 1 round.

Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs
Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves.

Effect: Poison Weapon.name: Effect: Poison Weapon
Effect: Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.ALbosSUygdq4T1Yk].

Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon.name: Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon
Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon.description: The chosen weapon deals an extra 1d6 positive damage.

Effect: Prevailing Position.name: Effect: Prevailing Position
Effect: Prevailing Position.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Xw7qG0SHepXx24vl]

You leave the stance you were in, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw or to your AC against the triggering attack.

Effect: Primal Aegis.name: Effect: Primal Aegis
Effect: Primal Aegis.description: You and allies within 30 feet of you gain resistance equal to your Wisdom modifier to acid, cold, electricity, fire, negative, and positive damage.

Effect: Propulsive Leap.name: Effect: Propulsive Leap
Effect: Propulsive Leap.description: You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired).name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (.name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (.description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered).name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Protective Spirit Mask.name: Effect: Protective Spirit Mask
Effect: Protective Spirit Mask.description:
You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of the caster's next turn.

Granted By:@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.nn7DiYYWinsSYrZy]

Effect: Psychic Rapport.name: Effect: Psychic Rapport
Effect: Psychic Rapport.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.9oKtrUzXixj58hOg]

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation checks, and to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]

Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self).description: The border between life and death becomes blurred to you. You gain a +2 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws for 1 round.

Effect: Purifying Breeze.name: Effect: Purifying Breeze
Effect: Purifying Breeze.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws.

Effect: Push Back the Dead!.name: Effect: Push Back the Dead!
Effect: Push Back the Dead!.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against effects originating from undead.

Effect: Radiant Infusion.name: Effect: Radiant Infusion
Effect: Radiant Infusion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.JcXzKwrdMkNszrJQ].

If the next action you use is to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs] to restore Hit Points to a single living creature, the target deals an additional 1d6 positive damage with its melee weapons and unarmed attacks until the end of its next turn. If the heal spell is at least 5th level, this damage increases to 2d6, or 3d6 if the spell is at least 8th level.

Effect: Rage.name: Effect: Rage
Effect: Rage.description:
Requirements You aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw] or raging

You tap into your inner fury and begin raging. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Constitution modifier. This frenzy lasts for 1 minute, until there are no enemies you can perceive, or until you fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf], whichever comes first. You can't voluntarily stop raging. While you are raging:

  • You deal 2 additional damage with melee weapons and unarmed attacks. This additional damage is halved if your weapon or unarmed attack is agile.
  • You take a -1 penalty to AC.
  • You can't use actions with the concentrate trait unless they also have the rage trait. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ] while raging.

After you stop raging, you lose any remaining temporary Hit Points from Rage, and you can't Rage again for 1 minute.

Implemented Effects:

  • Temporary hitpoint based on level and con mod
  • Enables rage property for rage damage
  • Sets token effect

Effect: Rallying Charge.name: Effect: Rallying Charge
Effect: Rallying Charge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.df4cBV3qZn3qNUmP]

You gain temporary hit points equal to the Charisma modifier of the creature that used Rallying Charge.

Effect: Rampaging Form.name: Effect: Rampaging Form
Effect: Rampaging Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Zl6vDXJEM7Lbp8JQ]

You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d8 piercing + 1d4 fire damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 additional fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe] as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes [[/r 3d6[fire]]] damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.

Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kit.name: Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kitsune)
Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Zl6vDXJEM7Lbp8JQ]

You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d8 piercing + 1d4 cold damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 additional cold damage, and your cold spells deal one additional die of cold damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh] as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes [[/r 3d6[cold]]] damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.

Effect: Read Shibboleths.name: Effect: Read Shibboleths
Effect: Read Shibboleths.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Crd3qMecF9FYHjuH]

Once you've gleaned one or more true minor facts about a person, you can then incorporate these mannerisms into your speech to present yourself in a way that they find familiar. This grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to your Diplomacy and Deception checks with them.

Effect: Reanimator Dedication.name: Effect: Reanimator Dedication
Effect: Reanimator Dedication.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.5Cm2TYHzoO2DbQNM]

The undead you animate gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, AC, saving throws, and skill checks for the duration of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0].

Effect: Recall Under Pressure.name: Effect: Recall Under Pressure
Effect: Recall Under Pressure.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws for the remainder of the combat encounter as your morale soars or a +2 status bonus if the card you drew was from the suit of Books.

Effect: Reckless Abandon (Barbarian).name: Effect: Reckless Abandon (Barbarian)
Effect: Reckless Abandon (Barbarian).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.EWeso1zDkCLGlnsW]

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, a -2 penalty to AC, and a -1 penalty to saves. These bonuses and penalties last until your Rage ends or until you are above half Hit Points, whichever comes first.

Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin).name: Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin)
Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin).description: For the remainder of your turn, if you roll a failure or critical failure on a saving throw against a harmful effect, you get a success instead.

Effect: Reflexive Shield.name: Effect: Reflexive Shield
Effect: Reflexive Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.dHUoQVzDa9Cf4QCG] when you raise a shield that gives a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

You gain your shield's cricumstance bonus to Reflex saves.

Effect: Renewed Vigor.name: Effect: Renewed Vigor
Effect: Renewed Vigor.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level plus your Constitution modifier.

Effect: Resounding Bravery.name: Effect: Resounding Bravery
Effect: Resounding Bravery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.dTO1ShJovbzrKUY4] if you critically succeed at a Will save against a foe's ability.

You gain a +1 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level for 1 minute.

Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear).name: Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear)
Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.dTO1ShJovbzrKUY4] if you critically succeed at a Will save against a foe's fear effect.

You gain a +2 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 minute.

Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide important insights that keep your less experienced colleagues safe from harm. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to saving throws to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's saving throw modifiers by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Safeguard Soul.name: Effect: Safeguard Soul
Effect: Safeguard Soul.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against death effects, possession effects, and effects that attempt to manipulate or steal your soul.

Effect: Saoc Astrology.name: Effect: Saoc Astrology
Effect: Saoc Astrology.description:
This effect grants you the selected circumstance bonus or penalty to skill checks.

Note: The effect lasts until the end of your turn, and should be manually removed after you have made a skill check.

Effect: Scout's Warning.name: Effect: Scout's Warning
Effect: Scout's Warning.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Tpcq3Lk7qEOZ3LDP].

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your initiative roll.
